ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET POLICY Observed DNS Query to Commonly Abused Cloudflare Domain (trycloudflare .com)
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET POLICY Observed DNS Query to Commonly Abused Cloudflare Domain (trycloudflare .com)"; dns.query; dotprefix; content:".trycloudflare.com"; nocase; endswith; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2034552; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2021_11_29, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Major, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2021_11_29;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO LNK File Downloaded via HTTP
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET INFO LNK File Downloaded via HTTP"; flow:established,to_client; file_data; content:"|01 14 02 00 00 00 00 00 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 46|"; fast_pattern; offset:4; depth:16; reference:url,learn.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-shllink/c3376b21-0931-45e4-b2fc-a48ac0e60d15; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2048508; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_10_10, deployment Perimeter, deployment SSLDecrypt, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2023_10_10, reviewed_at 2023_10_10;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Successful PROPFIND Response for Application Media Type
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING Successful PROPFIND Response for Application Media Type"; flow:established,to_client; flowbits:isset,ET.PROPFIND; http.stat_code; content:"207"; file.data; content:"|3d 22|DAV|3a 22 3e|"; content:"response>"; distance:0; content:"href>"; distance:0; content:":href>"; distance:0; content:"status>HTTP/1.1 200 OK"; content:"getcontenttype>application/"; fast_pattern; reference:url,iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml; reference:url,datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4918#section-9.1; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2049438; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_11_30, deployment Perimeter, deployment SSLDecrypt, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2023_11_30;)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects "svchost.exe" spawning "rundll32.exe" with command arguments like "C:\windows\system32\davclnt.dll,DavSetCookie".
This could be an indicator of exfiltration or use of WebDav to launch code (hosted on a WebDav server).

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: DNS Query To Common Malware Hosting and Shortener Services
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects DNS queries to domains commonly used by threat actors to host malware payloads or redirect through URL shorteners.
These include platforms like Cloudflare Workers, TryCloudflare, InfinityFree, and URL shorteners such as tinyurl and lihi.cc.
Such DNS activity can indicate potential delivery or command-and-control communication attempts.

Detects DNS requests to Cloudflared tunnels domains.
Attackers can abuse that feature to establish a reverse shell or persistence on a machine.

Detects "svchost.exe" spawning "rundll32.exe" with command arguments like "C:\windows\system32\davclnt.dll,DavSetCookie".
This could be an indicator of exfiltration or use of WebDav to launch code (hosted on a WebDav server).
